text: Ey, God tap tep ne ak, tap kuŋay yɨbɨl teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Ne gos tɨpagɨl yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd, tap okok mɨdupsek gos nɨgtep yɨbɨl gup. Gos ne ak yi okyaŋ mɨdɨl, ñɨg solwala muk okyaŋ tek mɨdeb. Chɨn bɨ okok, gos ne tɨg asɨkep jɨj ak pɨyowɨl nɨgtep gɨnɨgun tek ma yɨbɨl lup. Ne anɨb okok mɨdupsek gup ak, chɨn ne taynen anɨgup agɨl, nɨgtep gɨnɨgun tek ma yɨbɨl lup.
